amendment.description: Amendment sought to change the definition of the term "express advocacy" as contained in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to define "express advocacy" as a communication that advocates the election or defeat of a candidate by containing a phrase such as 'vote for', 'reelect', or 'defeat'.

action.text: Amendment (A041) offered by Mr. Whitfield to the Shays amendment (A002).
On agreeing to the Whitfield amendment (A041) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 238 (Roll No. 375).
